facet_1.name: One Man Army
facet_1.effects: Grants Axe temporary strength based on Axe's current armor. Allied heroes venturing too close to Axe passively disables this effect linearly.

facet_2.name: Call Out
facet_2.effects: Berserker's Call grants affected enemy units bonus attack speed, while granting Axe additional bonus armor for the duration.

effects: After a set number of attacks, Axe performs a helix counter attack
The required attacks and incoming attacks per Counter Helix proc works simultaneously
Applies a stacking debuff on affected enemies within the radius that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe
All ability components are dispelled upon the caster's death
Berserker's Call now applies Battle Hunger to affected units within the radius
Reapplying the debuff now creates an independent and stackable debuff instance

level_10: +10% Self Move Speed per Battle Hunger Debuff

abilities.name: Coat of Blood
abilities.description: Grants bonus armor retroactively per hero kill credited to Axe
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Culling Blade

abilities.name: One Man Army
abilities.description: Grants Axe temporary strength based on Axe's current armor. Allied heroes venturing too close to Axe passively disables this effect linearly
abilities.details: Selecting the One Man Army facet unlocks this ability

ability_1.name: Berserker's Call
ability_1.details: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor for the duration
ability_1.description: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe
technical_details: Affected units within the radius cannot act and are forced to attack Axe
Active attack modifiers with autocast on are still applied
interaction_notes: Does not affect buildings, couriers, first wave lane creeps, hidden units, invulnerable units, ward-type units

ability_2.name: Battle Hunger
ability_2.details: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as it is facing away from Axe
ability_2.description: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied
technical_details: Less effective on creeps (0.5 move speed slow factor)
interaction_notes: Can be dispelled by killing any unit except illusions
Shard upgrade creates independent stackable debuff instances

ability_3.name: Counter Helix
ability_3.details: After a set number of incoming attacks, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies
ability_3.description: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs
technical_details: Scepter adds outgoing attack requirement and damage reduction debuff
interaction_notes: Tally counter persists through death but resets on respawn/reincarnation
Does not count attacks from allied units, buildings, or ward-type units
Scepter upgrade applies stacking damage reduction debuff (max 5 stacks, 12% per stack, 6s duration)

ability_4.name: Culling Blade
ability_4.details: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage
ability_4.description: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat
technical_details: Instant kills if target's current HP â¤ spell damage
Grants nearby allies bonus movement speed (20%/25%/30%) and armor (20/25/30) for 6s (9s with talent) when hero is killed
Resets cooldown when enemy hero is killed
interaction_notes: Dispels Borrowed Time, Shallow Grave, False Promise, Battle Trance before damage
Cooldown resets on hero kills including reincarnation sources

changes: Reduced Counter Helix enemy total outgoing attack damage reduction per stack from 15% to 12% (Aghanim's Scepter upgrade)
Increased Berserker's Call Call Out self armor bonus increase from 5 to 6
Reduced Battle Hunger movement speed slow from 15%/20%/25%/30% to 18%/22%/26%/30%
LVL 20 +25 Counter Helix damage increased to +30 (Talents)
Increased base attack damage from 30â34 to 31â35
Increased Battle Hunger damage per second from 10/15/20/25 to 12/18/24/30
Rescaled Counter Helix damage from 95/120/145/170 to 100/120/140/160
Reduced Culling Blade cooldown from 100/85/70 to 80/75/70
Reduced Counter Helix enemy total outgoing attack damage reduction per stack from 20% to 15% (Aghanim's Scepter upgrade)
